title: The Blind Date couple who married in front of millions
description: Sue and Alex Tatham became the first couple who met on Blind Date to get married. They reflect on a life together 40 years after the show first broadcast.
content:
Sue's friends submitted a letter without her knowledge, saying she would like to go on the biggest dating show on TV.
Alex was at work when a colleague came around holding papers in the air. Instead of auditing payroll, they spent the afternoon filli... [5760 chars]

title: Oscars 2026: How to watch this year's awards-tipped films from Hamnet to Marty Supreme.
description: Hamnet, Avatar and Marty Supreme will face one battle after another as the awards race heats up.
content:
Hollywood stars are preparing to attend one ceremony after another, as the film awards season gets fully under way.
Marty Supreme, Hamnet and Wicked: For Good are a few of the frontrunners in what is shaping up to be a competitive year for the Oscars... [617 chars]

title: National guard member Sarah Beckstrom has died after shooting in Washington DC, Trump announces
description: One other member of the guards, Andrew Wolfe, 24, is still fighting for his life, according to the president
content:
Sarah Beckstrom, one of the national guard troops shot in Washington DC on Wednesday, has died, Donald Trump said on Thursday.

title: National Guard member dies after shooting in Washington DC
description: National Guard member Sarah Beckstrom, 20, has died from her injuries, said President Donald Trump on Thursday.
content:
One of the two members of the National Guard that were shot in Washington DC on Wednesday has died, US President Donald Trump said.
Sarah Beckstrom, 20, died from her injuries, President Trump said on Thursday.

title: Trump says one of National Guard members shot in Washington DC has died
description: One of the National Guard members shot in Washington DC on Wednesday has died from her injuries, Donald Trump has said.
content:
One of the National Guard members shot in Washington DC on Wednesday has died from her injuries, Donald Trump has said.
The president said 20-year-old Sarah Beckstrom had "just passed away" and called her a "highly respected" and "magnificent person"... [1918 chars]
